mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_house_source (id, uuid, source, url, source_id, title, grading_name, use_type, sales_type, status, province, city, district, cbd, room, hall, kitchen, toilet, balcony, floor, total_floor, publish_price, property_right_type, building_year, building_area, usable_area, housing_type, decoration_type, building_structure, orientation, describes, contact, contact_mobile, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kitchen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toilet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balcony,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{propertyRightType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{usableArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{housingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decorationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_house_source set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grading_name = #{gradingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_type = #{salesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cbd = #{cbd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hall = #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kitchen = #{kitchen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, toilet = #{toilet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balcony = #{balcony,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_floor = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_price = #{publishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, property_right_type = #{propertyRightType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_year = #{buildingYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_area = #{buildingArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, usable_area = #{usableArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, housing_type = #{housingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decoration_type = #{decorationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_structure = #{buildingStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describes = #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_mobile = #{contactMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.uuid as t_uuid, t.source as t_source, t.url as t_url, t.source_id as t_source_id, t.title as t_title, t.grading_name as t_grading_name, t.use_type as t_use_type, t.sales_type as t_sales_type, t.status as t_status, t.province as t_province, t.city as t_city, t.district as t_district, t.cbd as t_cbd, t.room as t_room, t.hall as t_hall, t.kitchen as t_kitchen, t.toilet as t_toilet, t.balcony as t_balcony, t.floor as t_floor, t.total_floor as t_total_floor, t.publish_price as t_publish_price, t.property_right_type as t_property_right_type, t.building_year as t_building_year, t.building_area as t_building_area, t.usable_area as t_usable_area, t.housing_type as t_housing_type, t.decoration_type as t_decoration_type, t.building_structure as t_building_structure, t.orientation as t_orientation, t.describes as t_describes, t.contact as t_contact, t.contact_mobile as t_contact_mobile, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_house_source t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
